dialogue.speaker: Lord Edgar
dialogue.text: Welcome, brave adventurer, to the land of Eldoria.

dialogue.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogue.text: I sense a darkness growing in power. We must act swiftly to stop it.

dialogue.speaker: Lord Edgar
dialogue.text: I have reason to believe that the dark sorcerer, Malakar, is behind this evil. We must gather a party to stop him.

dialogue.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogue.text: I am with you, Lord Edgar. Let us not tarry. The fate of Eldoria hangs in the balance.
